text: Ne ‘‘itsulile” olwa Musa yasaba Nyasaye amatsi khulwa Abandu bebe, mana nikhumuboolela mbu “khupa indabushi yiyio khwichina” Mana tsindoto ekhumi na tsibili nitsirundukha, mana buli ikholo nimanya habundu wayo wokhunywa, Mulie mana munywe khumukabo kwa Nyasaye ne mulakhola obwononi khushialo tawe
